mapper.select:
SELECT s.sa_id AS id, s.name FROM ${account}.dbo.pda_stockArea s
s.s_id=#{sId}
SELECT db_name AS id, account_name AS name FROM pda_account_set

SELECT TOP 10 l.loc_code AS result, l.loc_name AS name FROM ${account}.dbo.pda_locationTrace lt LEFT JOIN ${account}.dbo.pda_location l ON l.l_id = lt.Location_id WHERE lt.lt_id IN (SELECT lt_1.lt_id FROM ${account}.dbo.pda_locationTrace lt_1 WHERE lt_1.p_id = #{pId} AND lt_1.rectime = ( SELECT DISTINCT MAX(rectime) AS time FROM ${account}.dbo.pda_locationTrace lt_2 WHERE lt_2.p_id = #{pId} AND lt_2.Location_id = lt_1.Location_id)) ORDER BY lt.rectime DESC

SELECT b.billid AS id, b.billnumber AS documentNo, CONVERT(VARCHAR(100), b.pdaInTime, 23) AS documentDate, 4 AS type, '复核单' AS typeDescription, CASE b.billstates WHEN 10 THEN '未复核' WHEN 13 THEN '复核中' ELSE '' END AS status FROM ${account}.dbo.pda_CheckBill b WHERE b.pdastates != 2 ORDER BY documentDate DESC
SELECT s.s_id AS id, s.name FROM ${account}.dbo.pda_storages s

SELECT s.sa_id AS id, s.name FROM ${account}.dbo.pda_stockArea s
WHERE s.s_id=#{warehouseId}

SELECT a.sc_id AS id, a.name FROM ${account}.dbo.pda_Area a
WHERE a.sa_id=#{repositoryId}

SELECT p.p_id AS id, p.name AS goodsName, p.standard AS specification, p.Factory AS manufacturer, p.serial_number AS goodsEncode FROM ${account}.dbo.pda_Products p LEFT JOIN ${account}.dbo.pda_location l ON p.WholeLoc = l.l_id OR p.SingleLoc = l.l_id WHERE l.loc_code = #{condition}
